div.label: Vietnamese
div.div: Quốc kỳ nước Việt Nam Dân chủ Cộng hòa

td.div: Tiếng Việt: Quốc kỳ Việt Nam Dân chủ Cộng hòa, 1945-1955
Deutsch: Flagge des ehemaligen Nordvietnams von 1945 bis 1955
English: Flag of North Vietnam (Democratic Republic of Vietnam) from 1945 to 1955. Adopted by Vietminh in 1941.
Français : Drapeau de la République démocratique du Viêt Nam, 1945-1955
日本語: 越南民主共和国の国旗、1945年－1955年
Русский: Флаг Демократической Республики Вьетнам в 1945—1955 гг.

tr.td: See File History below for details.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr; border-spacing: 8px; padding: 0px;

td.div:
This work is in the public domain in Vietnam for one of the following reasons:
It is a cinematographic work, photographic work, work of applied art or anonymous work first published more than 75 years ago. (See Commons:Copyright_rules_by_territory/Vietnam)
It is a cinematographic work, photographic work, dramatic work, work of applied art or anonymous work first published more than 50 years prior to January 1, 2010.
It is another type of work, and the creator died more than 50 years ago.
To uploader: Please provide where the image was first published and who created it.

p.span: English | Deutsch | français | Bahasa Melayu | Tiếng Việt | 中文 | Español | +/−

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr; border-spacing: 8px; padding: 0px;

td.i: This work is ineligible for copyright and therefore in the public domain because it consists entirely of information that is common property and contains no original authorship.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa;

tr.td:
Legal disclaimer
This image is or contains a symbol or symbols prohibited by law in the nations mentioned below, due to (variously) representations of communism, socialism, or similar governmental structures; or of parties/organizations associated with said:
Ukraine's Verkhovna Rada (article 436-1 of the Criminal code of Ukraine)
Georgia's parliament
Hungary: Act C of 2012 on the Criminal Code, Section 335
Latvia's Saeima
Lithuania's Constitutional Court passed Article 18818 of the Code of Administrative Offences
Germany's Criminal Code §86a, referring to the "use of symbols of unconstitutional organizations" outside the contexts of "art or science, research or teaching"
Indonesia's People's Consultative Assembly
Bans no longer in effect include:
Moldova: LPC192/2012ro,ru
Poland: Art. 256 of the Dz.U. 1997 nr 88 poz. 553 of the criminal code has removed references to imagery and now only covers promotion of communist ideas
Imagery covered may include the hammer and sickleen, red star, emblems/insignias, flags or images of leaders.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa;

tr.td: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

span.span: The source code of this SVG is valid.
This flag was created with an unknown SVG tool

div.p: The colors approximation is listed below:

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr; border-spacing: 8px; padding: 0px;

td.i: This image of simple geometry is ineligible for copyright and therefore in the public domain, because it consists entirely of information that is common property and contains no original authorship.

div.div:
Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time. (newest | oldest) View (newer 10 | older 10) (10 | 20 | 50 | 100 | 250 | 500)
Date/TimeThumbnailDimensionsUserComment
current16:33, 15 October 2020900 × 600 (289 bytes)FDRMRZUSA (talk | contribs)Fixed geometry for the "star", according to related construction sheet: [https://fotw.info/flags/vn-1945.html#constr] ("Flags of the World"). Optimized svg code, with code cleanup and reduction. No other changes.
16:01, 18 March 2016900 × 600 (332 bytes)EclecticArkie (talk | contribs)svg code reduction
20:32, 12 August 2013900 × 600 (2 KB)Huyme (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 21:31, 24 May 2013
21:35, 24 May 2013900 × 600 (2 KB)BCD-2 (talk | contribs)Tried another time...
21:34, 24 May 2013900 × 600 (825 bytes)BCD-2 (talk | contribs)This is the last attempt I do, help me if I fail!
21:31, 24 May 2013900 × 600 (2 KB)BCD-2 (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 08:42, 10 April 2011 Now better???
21:30, 24 May 2013900 × 600 (825 bytes)BCD-2 (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 13:38, 27 August 2006 Please help me bringing back the first flag!!!!
21:29, 24 May 2013900 × 600 (825 bytes)BCD-2 (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 21:27, 24 May 2013 What's this???
21:28, 24 May 2013900 × 600 (825 bytes)BCD-2 (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 21:26, 24 May 2013 (How is this done???)
21:27, 24 May 2013900 × 600 (825 bytes)BCD-2 (talk | contribs)Haha I failed there! ;) Attempted right-up (as this is the first time I do this)
(newest | oldest) View (newer 10 | older 10) (10 | 20 | 50 | 100 | 250 | 500)

This file contains additional information such as Exif metadata which may have been added by the digital camera, scanner, or software program used to create or digitize it. If the file has been modified from its original state, some details such as the timestamp may not fully reflect those of the original file. The timestamp is only as accurate as the clock in the camera, and it may be completely wrong.
